评论详情: Exactly what I was looking for
While I can’t afford the real deal, this version will do! It hasn’t tarnished, and I wash my hands a lot, so that’s a plus. I think the size is accurate, and it’s comfy and stylish.
So chic.  I get lots of complements, when I wear this.  The quality is very nice.
I love it so much! Gold color is not too light yellow. Looks 18k gold rings.
Size 8 is deft size 7. Nice ring but I cannot wear it.
I wanted to love it but its very very yellow. Otherwise everything else is nice. May look great with the silver option.
Very cute and seems like good quality.  It did come small though, about 2 sizes. I ordered a size 8 and it came as a size 6. If you order up 2 sizes though it would be a great ring

i ordered a size 9 and it was a HUGE fit like a 10-11, re ordered a size 8 because i’ve been looking for a quilt ring for so long…. still huge🥲 i think the sizes are just off, i would check ur ring size and match the dimensions when you order!!! but i still wear it everyday since this “size 8” is wearable it’s just not snug. but absolutely NO tarnishing after 3 months or so of wear everyday which is amazing
Good quality, nice color and shape. Only thing is the sizing, it was off for me. I ordered two different sizes, but neither fit me.
I wanted to like this ring really badly, but it was just a little bit more of a gun metal look than sterling silver so I returned.
Silver is better looking than gold. Gold looks very cheap. Also I like the larger sizes for my thick fingers.
So far, so good. I love the look of this ring, and the color is still intact, even after washing my hands with the ring on. The size is also correct.
Although it is extremely polished looking I would recommend it for the price it almost looks like the real thing.
The ring is a very yellow gold which I didn’t like. It didn’t tarnish for the bit I wore it. But I couldn’t get past the colour of it.
